sentences.en: A curl of black hair fell loosely across his forehead.
sentences.cn: 他的额头上垂着一绺散开的黑色卷发。

sentences.en: a little boy with beautiful blonde curls
sentences.cn: 满头漂亮的金色鬈发的小男孩

sentences.en: A thin curl of smoke rose from a rusty stove.
sentences.cn: 生锈的炉子里冒出一缕青烟。

sentences.en: Decorate the cake with chocolate curls.
sentences.cn: 用巧克力圈装饰蛋糕。

sentences.en: Does her hair curl naturally?
sentences.cn: 她的头发是天然鬈曲的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Dry curly hair naturally for maximum curl and shine.
sentences.cn: 让卷发自然变干，才能使头发卷最多，最有光泽。

sentences.en: hair that has a natural curl
sentences.cn: 自然卷曲的头发

sentences.en: He wanted to curl into a tiny ball.
sentences.cn: 他想蜷缩成小小的一团。

sentences.en: Her lip curled in contempt.
sentences.cn: 她轻蔑地撇撇嘴。

sentences.en: I've seen you curl your lip when they have been mentioned.
sentences.cn: 我发现每逢有人提起他们时,你就撇嘴.

sentences.en: In colder weather, your cat will curl up into a tight, heat-conserving ball.
sentences.cn: 天气更冷时，猫会为了保存热量而紧紧地缩成一团。

sentences.en: Maria had curled her hair for the event.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚为这次活动卷了头发。

sentences.en: Mary was busy curling her hair.
sentences.cn: 玛丽在忙着卷头发。

sentences.en: Raise one foot, curl the toes and point the foot down-wards.
sentences.cn: 抬起一只脚，弯曲脚趾，使脚尖朝下。

sentences.en: She has hair that refuses to curl.
sentences.cn: 她头发不易出卷。

sentences.en: She put her hair in rollers to make it curl.
sentences.cn: 她用卷发夹子把头发弄鬈曲.

sentences.en: She put up her hand and smoothed back the curl.
sentences.cn: 她抬起手来,把鬈发向后按了按.

sentences.en: The child curled up in an armchair to read.
sentences.cn: 那个小孩蜷曲在沙发里看书

sentences.en: The clothes some young people wear nowadays really make your hair curl.
sentences.cn: 现今有些年轻人穿的衣服的确令人惊诧.

sentences.en: The curl was invented to help describe the properties of moving fluids.
sentences.cn: 创造旋度一词为了有助于描述运动流体的性质.

sentences.en: The lips had already a little curl of bitterness and skepticism.
sentences.cn: 一缕辛酸和怀疑的神情,时时隐现在他的唇边.

sentences.en: The wave and curl of her blonde hair gave her sensuality and youth.
sentences.cn: 波浪形的金色卷发让她显得性感又年轻。

sentences.en: Use a diffuser to maximise the volume and curl of your hair.
sentences.cn: 使用电吹风罩把头发吹得蓬松卷曲。
